title: Hey Riot, Can I get a game with some reds?
body: My Birthday is this weekend (Aug 17th) and I have had the game since season 1, bought it on disc even! Wondering if I could get a game with some reds, I don't remember ever having played with one and it would be awesome to get some birthday games in with some of you guys!

replies.body:
Sure! I'll see what reds I can rustle up for a birthday game!

It is really awesome that you are one of the original buyers of the free game (rofl).  Care to share a pic of the disc or yourself holding it? ^_^
I think everyone forgot about me, I hear the crickets q.q
Its pretty cool that u guys play with the users. I can never imagine my teachers playing a game with me...not that I want to either tho...
:o I'll totally play! I'll even play Surpise Party Fiddlesticks!
Awesome! Would add a b-day party flavor to the game xD.
Fair warning, I'm not the best Fiddle, BUT I WILL TRY MY HARDEST AND PUT PARTY HATS ON ALL THE ENEMIES.
No worries, win or lose, just excited to play with some employees who work on or with the game! I just started picking up ranked seriously this season so I'm no Diamond either lol.
Awww yiss!
Depending on time/day during weekends, I'm almost always on. So feel free to include me, Most Exalted Avian Empress of Breakfast, if you need another.
Would be really cool if you played with us, I'm a lore nut haha, can't wait to get some more ways for us to get into the story behind League!
I never got an invite q.q or saw a notification -- that's what I was looking for and I'm sorry, I should have come back to this post! BUT WE SHOULD STILL PLAY
My fault as well then, I thought the invites would be the other way around :P. So it's probably on me. So I should just add you all then??

oh no you don't have to :) (several of us have full friends lists!) you can just invite us to a lobby by typing our names in the invite thinger. 

BUT I WILL TOTALLY INVITE YOU NOW. READY?
Im at work :c. I'll be on today though, around 4:15 CST! :D
OK! See you later then, we will try to work out a time :)
Alright! Thanks again!
I'm online now if any of you are on! :D
Two questions: One, will silver kayle ever come back out. Two, what are reds ? (still kinda new to lol)
reds are riot employees
reds are riot employees

I really hope not, and that's not to be mean, Silver Kayle lets me feel special because I was one of the first supporters of the game. Buying it on disc is something that most people didn't do and I like being able to say I supported a game that I still play today.

Reds are Riot employees.

I sadly no longer have the disc, Just the Silver Kayle skin to confirm I did :(. To be Honest I never thought it would become something so rare. Now, Years later, I see that it is XD, and thanks Baconhawk!
I'm not sure, but I think I'm in the same boat. I just bought it for the champion bundle and RP that came with it. At the time it was a way better deal than any other bundles available in the store.
It was a really good deal! A good bundle of champs for the time, a free exclusive skin, and 10$ in RP. For 20$
